title: Jedward's dad 'fighting for life in hospital' but condition was kept secret from duo while in CBB house
text:
Showbiz Jedward's dad 'fighting for life in hospital' but condition was kept secret from duo while in CBB house The Irish duo's mum said John Grimes decided not to inform them because he didn't want it to jeopardise their chances of reaching the final Share The duo would have left the house to the sad news   
Jedward's dad John Grimes is critically ill in hospital but his condition was kept from the Irish duo while they were in the Celebrity Big Brother house. 
The X Factor stars came in second place on Friday night, losing out to Coleen Nolan. 
And the pair would have left the house to the sad news that their father has been in intensive care. 
Proud dad John wanted his sons to enjoy their time in the house so decided not to tell them, said their mum. 
Jedward's mum and manager Susanna Condron told the Daily Star: “The last week has been very stressful for Jedward’s family. Jedward are evicted in second place during the Big Brother 2017 final (Photo: PA) Jedward - Celebrity Big Brother Final 2017 (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) 
“John Snr has been in intensive care. He insisted Edward and John must not be informed about his critical condition. 
She added: “He stated he would not jeopardise their chances of reaching the final as ‘there would have been legions of disappointed fans’.” Jedward - Celebrity Big Brother Final 2017 (Photo: WireImage) Jedward - Celebrity Big Brother Final 2017 (Photo: Channel 5) 
Speaking during their exit interview on Friday night, Jedward said: "We're so happy we came second. Last time we came third and this time we came second so it's a personal best. 
"We can't wait for Coleen's book, 'I've Lived With Jedward'." 
They added that it was "great to come back as an All Star". 
And speaking about the drama between them and the other housemates, Jedward said: "We came in later and everyone had already bonded. 
"We were more outspoken this series. I think a lot of the housemates were pre-judging us. We were very innocent last time and this time we were bad-ass rock stars." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
